title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 47.1 - Title and citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 47.1 - Title and citation

State Regulations

Within and for the purposes of the Department of Labor this

Part (rule) may be known as Industrial Code Rule No. 47 relating to transparent
glass doors in mercantile establishments and in public and commercial buildings
and structures, and may be cited as Rule 47 as an alternative and without
prejudice to its designation and citation established by the Secretary of

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
47.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
